sentences: Ühiselamu nõukogu esimees valiti uueks aastaks.
context: The Estonian word 'nõukogu' means a council or soviet, referring to an elected/appointed governing or advisory body. It combines 'nõu' (advice) and 'kogu' (collective/assembly). This term was historically used for political organs like the NSV Liidu Ministrite Nõukogu (Council of Ministers of the USSR), but is also used in contexts like university councils, housing associations, or various professional bodies. The word has both nominative and genitive forms as 'nõukogu', with plural form 'nõukogud'.
